queries.query: SELECT TEST, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM ( SELECT (COUNT(*)=1) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_AUDIT_APPS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=7) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_AUDIT_PROPERTIES UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=6) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_CLASSES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=36) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_CLASS_PROPERTIES UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=11) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_ACTIONS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=8) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_ASPECT_EXIF WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=10) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_ASPECT_VERSIONABLE WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=334) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=196) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_CONTENTS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=0) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_CONTENT_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_CONTENT_TAGS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_CONTENT_TODOLIST WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=84) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_FOLDERS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_FOLDER_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_FOLDER_DATALIST WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_FOLDER_TAGS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=1) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_INSTANCES" UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=13) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_MIME_TYPES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=15) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_NODE_TYPES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_TAGS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=9) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_USERS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=6) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_WF_DEFINITIONS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=6) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_WF_DEPLOYMENTS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_WF_INSTANCES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=6) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_WF_ITEMS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_DIM_WF_TASKS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4753) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_ALF_FACT_ACCESSES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=18) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DATA_QUALITY UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=12) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DATA_QUALITY_LOGS UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)>=2212) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DIM_DATES"UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)>=75) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DIM_DATES_MONTHS UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)>=8) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DIM_DATES_YEARS UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=25) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DIM_TIME_HOURS UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=1441) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM DWH_DIM_TIME_MINUTES UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=8) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_ASPECT_EXIF WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=10) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_ASPECT_VERSIONABLE WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4753) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_AUDIT_ACCESSES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=337) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=195) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_CONTENTS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=0) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_CONTENT_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_CONTENT_TAGS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_CONTENT_TODOLIST WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=83) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_FOLDERS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_FOLDER_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_FOLDER_DATALIST WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=2) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_FOLDER_TAGS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=8) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_USERS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_WF_DEFINITIONS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_WF_DEPLOYMENTS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_WF_INSTANCES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_WF_ITEMS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=3) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM OPE_ALF_WF_TASKS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4753) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_AUDITS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=337) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_CATEGORIES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=278) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_NODES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=8) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_USERS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_WF_DEFINITIONS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_WF_DEPLOYMENTS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=4) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_WF_INSTANCES WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=5) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_WF_ITEMS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(*)=3) AS TEST, 0 AS DUMMY FROM STG_ALF_WF_TASKS WHERE INSTANCE_ID=${instanceId} ) GROUP BY "TEST";
